# internalRenderBlock

**Instance Property**

The block which you must provide, via a getter, in order to implement rendering.

## Declaration

```swift
var internalRenderBlock: AUInternalRenderBlock { get }
```

## Customizing the Audio Unit Behavior

- **registerSubclass(_:as:name:version:)**: Registers an audio unit subclass.
- **shouldChange(to:for:)**: This is called when you set the format on a bus.
- **setRenderResourcesAllocated(_:)**: Sets the Boolean value of the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AUAudioUnit/renderResourcesAllocated] property.
- **midiOutputBufferSizeHint**
- **AUInternalRenderBlock**: A block to render the audio unit.
